content.raw:
first glance `Pose::operator*` is equivalent to `Pose::operator+`, can someone else verify this?
Current unit tests are only applied to latter, so if this is the case, then this is OK.
content.html: first glance Pose::operator* is equivalent to Pose::operator+, can someone else verify this? Current unit tests are only applied to latter, so if this is the case, then this is OK.
